resources.string: Message Automation is an application build for automatically sending a sms based on the mode set. It will basically look for an incoming call and will auto send a sms to the incoming number.

We are very concern about the privacy of our users. We would like to inform all our users that this app do not store any kind of sensitive data of our users except the details that given by our users for the app to function well. 

The purpose of each permission is given below : 

• Phone : To detect any incoming calls in the device 

• Call logs : To detect the incoming call's phone number 

• SMS : To send sms to the caller of incoming call 

• Do not disturb : To manage device audio state

Rounak Roy 
Android Developer and UI Designer

Send an away from phone message when mode is set to available
Sorry %1$s isn\'t available. Will get back to you as soon as available. \n\nMessage auto-sent from Message Automation.
Hi there, %1$s is %2$s at the current moment. Will get back to you when available. \n\nMessage auto-sent from Message Automation.
